channel.title: Misc on My Little Stories
channel.description: Recent content in Misc on My Little Stories

item.title: Welcome to my new personal blog
item.description: Hi, My name is Siva and by profession I am a Software Developer. I do blog about the technology stuff that I learned at http://sivalabs.in. I wanted to start blogging about non-technical stuff and here I am with my new blog http://sivaprasadreddy.com/. Going forward you can find my thoughts on various interesting things in life here. Stay tuned ðŸ˜„
